title: Patriarchal power structures and women's roles

content.question: Taken together, the two images best support which of the following conclusions?

choices.label: New European technologies transformed African artistic traditions.
African societies that practiced Christianity generally gave women greater political and cultural prominence than did African societies that practiced traditional religions.
African societies combined a patriarchal power structure with cultural traditions that gave women a prominent place in social and cultural life.

content.answer: African societies combined a patriarchal power structure with cultural traditions that gave women a prominent place in social and cultural life.
